name: Nikola Jokic
description: 6'11" center, 41st pick became 3x MVP. 2023 champion. Sombor shuffle, supernatural passing, plays at his own pace. The Joker.

no-look-pass.name: No-Look Dime
no-look-pass.description: Ridiculous no-look pass from the post
no-look-pass.expression: seeing what no one else sees, savant vision
no-look-pass.prompt: delivering no-look pass from post position - eyes looking one direction, ball traveling completely different way, threading impossible needle, point-center vision that defies logic

sombor-shuffle.name: Sombor Shuffle
sombor-shuffle.description: Signature fadeaway with the shuffle step
sombor-shuffle.prompt: executing Sombor Shuffle fadeaway - shuffle step into fadeaway jumper, unorthodox footwork that only he can do, unstoppable despite not looking athletic

laughing.name: Joker Laughing
laughing.description: Laughing during game - joy of playing
laughing.prompt: laughing during game or after play - genuine joy, playing like a kid, the game is fun and he shows it, infectious happiness

slow-motion.name: Playing Slow
slow-motion.description: Moving at his own pace while dominating
slow-motion.prompt: moving deliberately in half-court offense - playing at his own slow tempo, controlling pace, making everyone else play at his speed, the pace manipulator

outlet-pass.name: Full Court Outlet
outlet-pass.description: Baseball pass full court for easy layup
outlet-pass.prompt: throwing full-court outlet pass - ball traveling length of court, finding cutting teammate in stride, the center who runs fast breaks from the rebound

horse-riding.name: Horse Lover
horse-riding.description: The man who loves horses and racing
horse-riding.prompt: relaxed expression thinking about horses - the champion who would rather be with his horses than collecting trophies, simple joys, Serbian horse racing enthusiast
